description: React component for the Integrations Page that manages and displays connector integrations, handles OAuth login flow, and allows disconnecting connectors.

methods.name: IntegrationsPage
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the integrations page with connectors and their management logic.

methods.name: onConnect
methods.description: Handles initiating OAuth login flow for a connector by redirecting to the auth URL.

methods.name: onDisconnect
methods.description: Handles disconnecting a connector and updating the UI accordingly.
